style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=22;fontStyle=1" value="複数のカスタムディレクティブを実装するプロセスのイメージ<div>(ApolloServer + Graphql-tools)</div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="60" width="632.5" x="768.75" y="670" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jmOC1G9fSItSnOtsKdpn-63" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="540" width="440" x="510" y="780" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jmOC1G9fSItSnOtsKdpn-64" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=top;rounded=0;fontSize=18;" value="<div style="line-height: 160%;"><b>directive @uppercase on FIELD_DEFINITION</b><div style="line-height: 160%;"><b>directive @auth on FIELD_DEFINITION</b></div><div><br></div><div style="line-height: 160%;">enum Role {</div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;">	USER</span><br></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;">	ADMIN</span><br></span></div><div style="line-height: 160%;">}</div><div><br></div><div style="line-height: 160%;">type User {</div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;">	id: ID!</span><br></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;">	name: String! <b>@uppercase</b></span><br></span></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;">	age: Int!</span><br></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 160%;">}</div><div><br></div><div style="line-height: 160%;">type Query {</div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;">	getAllUser: [User] <b>@auth</b></span><br></div><div style="line-height: 160%;">}</div></div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="490" width="400" x="530" y="805" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jmOC1G9fSItSnOtsKdpn-65" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="1380" width="630" x="1020" y="780" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jmOC1G9fSItSnOtsKdpn-66" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=top;rounded=0;fontSize=18;" value="<div style="line-height: 180%;"><div style="line-height: 180%;"><div style="line-height: 32.400002px;">import { UserResolver } from " . / user.resolver " ;</div><div style="line-height: 32.400002px;">import { mergedSchema } from " . / schema" ;</div></div><div style="line-height: 180%;">import { makeExecutableSchema } from " @graphql-tools / schema " ;<br></div><div style="line-height: 180%;">import {</div><div style="line-height: 180%;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	mapSchema</span>,</div><div style="line-height: 180%;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	getDirective,</span><br></div><div style="line-height: 180%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	MapperKind</span><br></span></div><div style="line-height: 180%;">} from " @graphql-tools/utils " ;</div><div style="line-height: 180%;">import { defaultFieldResolver } from " graphql " ;</div><div style="line-height: 180%;"><br></div><div style="line-height: 180%;">const directiveTransformer = ( schema ) =&gt; {</div><div style="line-height: 180%;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	return mapSchema (</span></div><div style="line-height: 180%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	schema ,</span><br></span></div><div style="line-height: 180%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	{</span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 180%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	[ MapperKind.OBJECT_FIELD ] : ( fieldConfig ) =&gt; {</span></span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 180%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><br></span></span></span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 180%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	<b style="color: rgb(0, 153, 0);">//@uppercaseディレクティブの検出</b></span><br></span></span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 180%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	const uppercaseDirective = getDirective (</span></span></span></span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 180%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	schema ,</span><br></span></span></span></span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 180%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	fieldConfig ,</span><br></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 180%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	"uppercase"</span><br></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 180%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>) ?. [0];</span><br></span></span></span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 180%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><br></span></span></span></span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 180%;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	<span style="color: rgb(0, 153, 0);"><b>//@authディレクティブの検出</b></span></span><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><br></span></span></span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 32.400002px;"><span style="white-space: pre;">				const authDirective = getDirective (</span></div><div style="line-height: 32.400002px;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	schema ,</span></span></div><div style="line-height: 32.400002px;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span ,</span><br></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 32.400002px;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	"auth"</span><br></span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 32.400002px;"><span style="white-space: pre;">				) ?. [0];</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span></div><div style="line-height: 180%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><br></span></span></span></span></span></span></div><div style="white-space: pre;">	if ( </span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="white-space: pre;">uppercaseDirective </span><span style="white-space: pre;">) {</span></div><div style="line-height: 180%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span pre;">	</span>}</span></div><div style="line-height: 180%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><br></span></div><div style="line-height: 180%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	if ( authDirective ) {</span></span></div><div style="line-height: 180%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 631px; height: 1px; padding-top: 50px; margin-left: 300px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 22px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
